name: Last L!fe: Force
description:
Vi the Major and leader of the Blue Team is on a mission to repel the enemy forces that have come to invade them. He must eliminate every threat and enemy leaders in order to win the war.

Controls:

W - Jump

A - Move to the left

S - Prone or move down

D - Move to the right

] - Shoot to the right

[ - Shoot to the left

Double Click - To interact with buttons

Tab - To restart the mission

Backspace - To return to Mission Select

Note:

Red soldiers only take one bullet to disarm and another bullet to kill.

The mission ends if the character dies or the enemy boss is dead.

Bosses are the enemy soldiers with stronger weapons. They are backed up by a mini-boss.

Characters don't heal.

You can fall through some platforms and crawl through tight areas by proning [ S ].

The game is still a prototype.

Grunting indicates the character taking damage.

Credits:

The sounds used in the game are from Pixabay.
